Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: On social media some Australians are optimistic and believe that interesting policies introduced in the federal budget would be introduced to help people. Others expressed concerns about the alleged delay in welfare payments amidst the cost-of-living crisis. Twitter users also discussed the allocation of funds to weapon supplies to Ukraine while some MPs raised concerns about the risk of failure in Big Build initiatives. Overall people are hoping for measures in the budget to address the pressing needs of Australians while maintaining a sustainable financial plan.
